Text: Don't even bother....Terrible copy of this classic film....This is supposed to be a B&W classic....But what you're getting is B&W with an overall dominant shading of green.....The whole movie is basically green tinted.....The movie itself, I gave it a rating of 8.5 but as far as the Visual quality rating is concerned?....It's a big huge green tinted disappointment!!!....Watchable but not what I would call a good copy.
